com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal

Class PdfCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal.PdfCard

  • public class PdfCard
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create CardView Layouts for each PDF thumbnail found in the internal data directory.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The context of the application.
        file - The thumbnail file of hte PDF.
        inflater - The LayoutInflater of the activity.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        private void delete()
        A function to delete the file when the user asks to delete it. This also asks the user whether he/she just wants to delete it from the menu or completely delete it.

      • edit

        private void edit()
        A function to edit the file when the user wants to.

      • getCard

        public android.view.View getCard()
        A function to get the CardView of the PDF.
        Returns:
        The cardView of the PDF with all the buttons.

      • getFile

        private java.io.File getFile(java.io.File file)
        A function to get the original PDF file from the name of the thumbnail.
        Parameters:
        file - The image file.
        Returns:
        The file object of the PDF.

      • getHeight

        private int getHeight()
        A function to get the optimal height of the thumbnail.
        Returns:
        The optimal height of the thumbnail.

      • getPercent

        private int getPercent(int of,
                       int percent)
        A function to get the 'percent' percent of 'of'
        Parameters:
        of - The percentage to get of.
        percent - The percentage to get.
        Returns:
        The calculated percentage.

      • getWidth

        private int getWidth()
        A function to get the optimal width of the thumbnail.
        Returns:
        The optimal width of the thumbnail.

      • init

        private void init()
        The main initialization function of the PdfCard.

      • rename

        private void rename()
        A function to rename the already scanned file.

      • setTitle

        private void setTitle()
        A function to set the title. This function is kept separate so that if the name is too long, it can be shortened and for that manipulation a separate block of code is made.
